thread.title: A fantastic place to stay
thread.title_full: A fantastic place to stay - Review of Covent Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: tbuae999
title: A fantastic place to stay
text:
The Covent Garden Hotel is a brilliant hotel both for business and pleasure.
It has a prime location but is also quiet at nighttime so you always get a good sleep.
The rooms are a nice size and the beds are very comfortable.
The staff are very helpful and friendly.
They serve an excellent breakfast too and the restaurant produces fine dining quality.
It's not cheap but it's excellent value.
